description: Gets the details of a single retained message for the specified topic. This action returns the message payload of the retained message, which can incur messaging costs. To list only the topic names of the retained messages, call ListRetainedMessages. Requires permission to access the GetRetainedMessage action. For more information about messaging costs, see Amazon Web Services IoT Core pricing - Messaging.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic name of the retained message to retrieve.

nested_items.name: topic
nested_items.description: The topic name to which the retained message was published.

nested_items.name: payload
nested_items.description: The Base64-encoded message payload of the retained message body.

nested_items.name: qos
nested_items.description: The quality of service (QoS) level used to publish the retained message.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The Epoch date and time, in milliseconds, when the retained message was stored by IoT.

nested_items.name: userProperties
nested_items.description: A base64-encoded JSON string that includes an array of JSON objects, or null if the retained message doesn't include any user properties.
